bibl.title: Order to Pay.
bibl.note: Apion (unlikely a member of the famous dynasty) tells Sambas to pay 26 1/4 solidi to an unspecified number of receivers of hay (χορτοπαραλῆμπαι). Arsinoites (?), AD VI (?).

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.idno: P. Dublin Inv. TCD Pap. Gr. 95a = P. Pintaudi 40

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Dublin Inv. TCD Pap. Gr. 95a = P. Pintaudi 40
Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 193-197 et pl. XL.
Apion (unlikely a member of the famous dynasty) tells Sambas to pay 26 1/4 solidi to an unspecified number of receivers of hay (χορτοπαραλῆμπαι). Arsinoites (?), AD VI (?).
